curam.core.impl.util
Class QueryBuilder

java.lang.Object
  curam.core.impl.util.QueryBuilder

public class QueryBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

This class builds CuramQuery objects.

                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> dictionary)

dictionary - Mapping of search service field names to names of fields in relevant Curam entity

public void setUnbounded(boolean unbounded)
Set this to true if the query results should not be restricted to a maximum of maxHits.

Parameters:
unbounded - Specifies if search is unbounded.

includeAllFieldsInService

public void includeAllFieldsInService()
                               throws AppException,
                                      InformationalException
Add all stored fields in the relevant search service to the list of fields to be returned by the query.

Throws:
AppException - application exception.
InformationalException - information exception.

setTerms

public void setTerms(java.lang.Object key)
Construct the terms of the query being built from a supplied key struct. For example, if we have a search service with a field called 'surname' and a key struct with the field 'surname' set to a value and a boolean value called 'searchBySurname' set to true, then a search term will be added searching a field called 'surname' for the specified value in the key struct. All available terms will be constructed.

Parameters:
key - the key struct containing details of the values to be searched for

excludeField

public void excludeField(java.lang.String fieldName)
Excludes the specified field name for the query.

Parameters:
fieldName - field name.

excludeFields

public void excludeFields(java.lang.String[] fieldNames)
Excludes the specified field names for the query.

Parameters:
fieldNames - List of field names.

Add an exclusive date and time range term, i.e. the range searched shall not be inclusive of the begin and end dates.

Parameters:
fieldName - name of field to search
beginDate - start of the date time range
endDate - end of the date time range
occurs - indicates whether the term must of should occur.

addExclusiveBeginDateTimeRangeTerm

public void addExclusiveBeginDateTimeRangeTerm(java.lang.String fieldName,
                                               DateTime beginDate,
                                               DateTime endDate,
                                               java.lang.String occurs)
Add a date and time range term where the begin date time is excluded, i.e. the range searched shall not be inclusive of the begin date time.

Parameters:
fieldName - name of field to search
beginDate - start of the date time range
endDate - end of the date time range
occurs - indicates whether the term must of should occur.

addExclusiveEndDateTimeRangeTerm

                                             DateTime beginDate,
                                             DateTime endDate,
                                             java.lang.String occurs)
Add a date and time range term where the end date time is excluded, i.e. the range searched shall not be inclusive of the end date time.

Parameters:
fieldName - name of field to search
beginDate - start of the date time range
endDate - end of the date time range
occurs - indicates whether the term must of should occur.
